page.title: 17WILDLIFE IN PENDLESIDE
page.content:
About 20 varieties of{MAMMALS}exist in the area, including: Badger Fox Squirrel,Grey Bat:Daubenton's Hare Hedgehog Long-eared Mink Rabbit Long-tailed Mole Deer,Roe fieldmouse Otter Vole Shrew:Common Stoat Weasel Pygmy
{REPTILES AND AMPHIBIANS} Frog,Toad,Newt-Common &Palmated,Lizard Grass-snake and Slow-worm are also found.
{FISH etc }Bullhead, Minnow,Stickleback and Trout are all to be found in the river, as are Caddis Fly,Mayfly,Dragon fly and Stonefly. Eels are fairly common, but the rarest water creature is the Crayfish which is found only at Barley.
